#### Notice Description
Natural Resources Canada (RNCan) invites proposals from qualified bidders to modify a pilot-scale reactor to demonstrate pressurized chemical looping, a carbon capture technology. The bidder shall modify an existing, TSSA-registered pressure vessel to house the reactor, as per the designs, drawings, and stamps of a licensed professional engineer in the province of Ontario. The contract includes modifying the vessel to conform to the specifications, pressure testing the modified vessel, and obtaining updated TSSA registration.

Please note that vendors responsible for the vessel's primer application and painting are not sought in this tender.

The bid solicitation cancels and supersedes a previous solicitation with a closing date of August 29, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EDT. Debriefing or feedback sessions will be offered to bidders upon request.

A comprehensive document describing the requirements can be found on the Government of Canada's tendering website.Offers will be evaluated based on the lowest price, and all requirements must be met.
